scenes.title: The Fateful Encounter

chapters.title: Status Test Chapter
chapters.content: This is test content for verifying chapter status transitions. The chapter should be able to move through all status states: outline, draft, revision, final, and locked. Adding more words to test the word count update in the footer.

chapters.title: AI Generated Chapter 2
chapters.content:
Chapter: The Crystal Chronicles

A new chapter begins. The story continues with new developments and revelations. Characters face challenges and make important decisions that will shape the narrative going forward.

This is AI-generated sample content demonstrating the chapter generation feature. In a full implementation, this would be actual narrative content generated by Claude based on your project's context, characters, and plot.

The chapter would include:
- Scene descriptions and atmosphere
- Character dialogue and interactions
- Plot advancement
- Thematic elements

[End of generated sample content]

worldbuildingEntries.name: The Crystal Tower
worldbuildingEntries.description: An ancient crystalline structure that serves as the seat of magical power in the realm. The tower is made entirely of enchanted crystal that glows with an inner light. Only those with pure intentions can enter its halls.

worldbuildingEntries.name: The Shadow Forest
worldbuildingEntries.description: A dark and mysterious forest on the outskirts of the kingdom. Known for its twisted trees and perpetual twilight.

worldbuildingEntries.name: The Royal Palace
worldbuildingEntries.description: The seat of royal power in the kingdom. A grand castle with high walls and golden spires.

relationships.dynamicDescription: TEST_RELATIONSHIP_12345: Perf Test 48 serves as mentor to Perf Test 49, guiding them through challenges.

qualityScores.bestsellerComparison: This chapter shows promise but needs refinement to reach commercial literary fiction standards. Successful debuts typically demonstrate more consistent voice and deeper thematic exploration.
